title: bootscreennx
desc: A website to create boot images or the Nintendo Switch
descFull: bootscreenx creates boot images for the Nintendo Switch that resemble BIOS screens from early computers. It was originally an update of a similar tool for the Nintendo 3DS, but was rewritten and improved.
